website_summaries.verdict: Pricey, but it delivers the precise level of cleaning you need when wearing braces.
pros: Offers 10 different pressure settings for the water flosser, ensuring you can remove food particles from around the braces without causing irritation
Nozzle rotates 360-degrees to reach all areas around the braces
cons: Higher than average price for a water flosser

customer_reviews.title: The product operates very well.
customer_reviews.text: So far it appears to function well with the exception of the plug in the tank which keeps falling out when I dry the inside. I of course am very careful not to lose this item. Having been a hygienist in the Navy I am very familiar with the Water Pik brand but felt your product would perform equally as well at a much more reasonable price. So far it has done what I expected and hope it continues.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Lee

customer_reviews.title: On my way to clean and healthy gums!
customer_reviews.text: Packaged received faster than expected. Impressed with the build quality and great price too! I have used waterpik's before in the past and this item fits the bill. A trip to the dentist is always filled with questions about my flossing and despite my efforts with the forsaken string I still get accused of ignoring flossing altogether. I have decided to strictly use a mouth irrigator with essential oils to help combat the issue. After 3 days of use, I am very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Savelli

customer_reviews.title: This is not a good product.  Lasted only 35 days.....no help from the company.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good product. It was purchased the later part of Nov. and it was given to me for a Christmas gift. I used it for 35 days and it quit working. Worked in the a.m. and wouldn't work that evening. I contacted the buyer and they said it was past the return date and wouldn't do anything about it. I really think that something like this should last longer than 35 days. It was only over the "return time" by 3 days when it quit. This is not a good product and the company does not stand behind their products. I would NOT buy anything from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Rb

customer_reviews.title: Compact, works great.
customer_reviews.text: I love this water pick. It's priced right and it works great. I had purchased another, larger unit from my son's dentist, and it was 4x the price. I like that this unit is compact and doesn't take up too much room on my bathroom counter. I purchased a second one to keep at my boyfriend's house so I have one to use when I am there. The cover holds the various tips out of sight. Just as a note, the tongue cleaner attachment is very small. I was expecting it to be bigger, although, it is pictured as is.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Getting used to it
customer_reviews.text: This is really a nice product for the price. I'm kind of having a hard time getting used to operating it because while I'm trying to hold the nozzle, with my right hand and turn it on there, it pops out while I try to turn it on with my left hand. I am sure I will get used to it, but there's got to be an easier way. I'm getting a face full of spray as it is now. But it does the job, the well is nice and big and the handle is nice, even though it just doesn't want to stay on the magnetized holder.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: 5 star product!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant buying a brand I did not know but have been brilliantly surprised. It's small enough to not overpower my counter space and I love that you can control the water pressure right from the hand unit. I have a hand tremor and have been able to manage with the Belmint. Very convenient water fill tub that I can lift right to the faucet. I would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Sallie K Isaacson

customer_reviews.title: Naughty naughty design.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 38 days and then lost all pressure. I decided to look inside to why. The screws holding the tank feed tube connector to the pump stripped out inside the device.. The plastic was so cheap that it seemed like I was dealing with wax. Would I spend money sending it for warranty If taking it apart didn't void it? No.. Trashcan.
customer_reviews.author: Chris t

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: It does floss and has magnetic catch (a nice feature) but the single button control is hard to use, and the settings move too easily so the stream isn't always the same.
customer_reviews.author: JaceyD

customer_reviews.title: As good as or better than Waterpik, at a lower price
customer_reviews.text: I had a waterpik as a teenager a million years ago. This product has a much greater range of intensities - the highest one is almost too hard, but it's very effective. I love the lid/container that holds the heads. Much better than having them exposed in the open bathroom air. My only negative comment is that it's difficult to turn off and on with one hand because the power button is on the intensity dial, but instead of being able to turn the dial to 0, you have to push the button in.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Dental Water Flosser
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I could not believe what came out of my mouth! I have several crowns and implants and it is difficult to floss under the gum line to get food particles. This dental flosser is the bomb. Several of my old crowns are being replaced due to decay caused by the food particle that I could not remove. This is quite costly! I hope that my new dental water flosser does the trick in keeping my money in my pocket!!! Well worth the few dollars spent vs over a thousand to replace a crown!!!
customer_reviews.author: Texan Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent oral care device
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, solid water pik-like product. It is noisy, yes, but you're only using it for a couple of minutes at a time so it's not that big a deal. Good water pressure and very easy to use with comprehensive, easy to follow instructions. I have not taken it traveling, and I'm not planning on doing so as i don't travel that much and there is a portable version for traveling. Still, a fine product and worth a try for the price you're paying.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Obert

customer_reviews.title: Love This Device
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I've made to help clean those hard to reach areas. After spending 10 minutes or more with dental floss on trouble areas this water flosser cleans the trouble spots with relative ease.
customer_reviews.author: Ronin

customer_reviews.title: I actually hate to give it 2 stars because I liked the ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually hate to give it 2 stars because I liked the design & cool blue color of this Water Flosser reservoir. But unfortunately I'm disappointed with the quality and functionality of this product. The motor seizes every 15 secs and has to be restarted every single time. Water pressure seems weak even at the MAXIMUM setting of 10. The reservoir cover doesn't fit tightly either. If those 3 things were rectified I'd probably give it 5 stars since it certainly looks better than the WaterPIK brand dental flosser.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I'd heard how much easier and more hygienic water flossers are compared to string floss, and it is SO much better in every way! I like the interchangeable heads so my family can all use it with their own tip, and I like how you can change the pressure to suit your needs. The automatic timer function is a nice touch too. All in all, it was a great purchase and I'll continue to use it from now on
customer_reviews.author: Spicy McG

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This water pick is amazing It has great pressure. The reservoir is a nice size, so when you have finished you feel like you have spent enough time. I like magnetic holder on the side to hold the pick being used and I like that the lid to the reservoir doubles as storage for the picks not being used.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: It Doesn't Want You To Add Anything To The Water
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and it works but there are a few things to be aware of. First of all the instructions warn you about adding chemicals to the water. It says "Certain types of mouthwash may damage the device by causing the water tank to crack. Therefore do not use mouthwash in the water tank". I've been adding a capful of Costco Mouthrinse to my Waterpik for years with no issues, so I'm going to ignore this advice. Secondly the handle is held in place magnetically, so don't try to push it down into the guide ears. Just keep the flat side against the device and the magnet will pull it up into place.
customer_reviews.author: curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: The lowest pressure is no Long the lowest.
customer_reviews.text: After about 2 weeks of use, the lowest pressure went up too high even the knob is already at the minimum. I tried to contact the seller here, but I don’t see the option here. Therefore I can only give a one star. I use it to clean my daughter’s cavities, it hurts her when the pressure is too high. She liked it when it was working(low pressure).
customer_reviews.author: Little Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Nice device
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience owning and using a water flosser but it has been good. The set up was easy as well as the use. The reason for 4 instead of 5 stars is the nuisance caused when attempting to open the storage case part. It always comes off the base and then falls into the water reservoir (prompting me to dump the water because of desire to have clean water...my idiosyncrasies abound :-) Other than that, great so far.
customer_reviews.author: DRJCE

customer_reviews.title: Squirts OK. But a hassle to operate.
customer_reviews.text: Squirts OK. But a hassle to operate. This machine might be fine for a younger person who is not dependent on their glasses to see. But it has 3 separate, small buttons, in 3 different locations, to operate it. Either the water squirts across the room or the nozzle falls off - letting the water just pour down the sink drain. Very little water actually squirts into my mouth because so much is lost while trying to manage all the buttons. Not suitable for people with visual or mild dexterity difficulties.
customer_reviews.author: L. Acree

customer_reviews.title: The setting is like a pulsating type and once you slow it down ...
customer_reviews.text: The setting is like a pulsating type and once you slow it down it sort of like cuts on and off, the cord makes it a little harder since it don’t really stretch as good. The tips are all the same but the tongue one. My older one was better than this and was friendly for kid to even use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: I am trying to super glue it together so I don't have to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: The feeder tube for the water pick pulls out of the receiver. I am trying to super glue it together so I don't have to buy a new one. Why can't companies make a quality product and not charge an arm and a leg. Crappy craftsmanship. Stop cutting corners and you will have better reviews
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: It leaks! My son used it once at night, and in the morning, we had a puddle under it. I cleaned it up, and he used it again. This time, it was dripping from the wand/handle as he was using it. It makes quite the mess that needs cleaned up each time you use it.
customer_reviews.author: HighEnergy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. Just stopped working for no reason. Motor running and no water shooting out. Please don’t waste your money on this. Made in China. Should have known right away it would break shortly after use.
customer_reviews.author: Elwood

customer_reviews.title: Do not use with cold water.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it for very long yet, but so far so good. Easy to use and effective. Keep a cup handy for filling the tank. Does not really like to be taken off to be filled. Valve leaks when removed. Just leave it in place and fill with a cup. Whatever you do, do not put cold water in tank! Use tepid to warm water in tank. If you use cold, it will shoot it deep enough that the cold will definitely wake you up in the morning! ‘Nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: AptFixer

customer_reviews.title: not really recommended.
customer_reviews.text: After going through two "Waterpiks" in three years (disintegrating rubber valve) I decided to try the Belmint. So far: significantly better than the clunky Waterpik. The unit works off a low voltage "wallwart' instead of 110 V mains, the water tube is more flexible and the pressure outstanding. Update after one year's use: The bad: Lasts about a year, the same as Waterpik.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pool

customer_reviews.title: First water flosser
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and I had no problem setting it up. The flosser performs well with plenty of pressure and seems well maid. The magnet that holds the handle is weak and does not work well. I did not find any warranty in the box or anywhere else, my fault for not doing enough research , this was an impulse buy. I am new to water flossing but after a couple of days I see the value in it , I have gum problems and crowns that are hard to clean with a brush, this works well I hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Large Tank
customer_reviews.text: This pic has a large tank which I like. I like also that the hose to the pic retracts to underneath the tank so it doesn't get in the way when not in use. I also like that extra pics store in the lid. My old pic had the extras sitting beside the tank and were always getting caught by the hose. It also made it harder to wipe down the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Rhetta

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little thing!
customer_reviews.text: Super nice product that came in a decent packaging. No missing items, extra nozzles are just awesome. The irrigator itself is not so easy to use as the pressure actually hurts the gums, it'll take time to get used to this but even now it's so convenient, I use it everyday. The "noise" is not really loud like as other reviewers said. My only problem is that it shuts off once it's half way down the container, just a little nuisance but not a reason to drop a star, at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy

customer_reviews.title: and seems more effective and less painful than flossing and I do it more often as ...
customer_reviews.text: My teeth are so clean now, and seems more effective and less painful than flossing and I do it more often as a result. My gum inflammation in problem areas has noticeably gone down. I'm looking forward to my next dental checkup/cleaning to see if they notice the improvement.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: My Teeth Power Washer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and returned the other popular brand as the units were received defective so I decided to try out this one. Wow what a difference. Same unit now for three years. I add mouthwash to the water container to give a treatment some flavor and then blast away every night. Even after brushing its incredible how many little particles get washed out. I see the dental hygienist three times a year. All of my gum readings are one's and two's. Occasionally a three. Before using this product, I had several readings of five or six. No more. I not only recommend this item to my friends, I brag about it.
customer_reviews.author: ray spencer

customer_reviews.title: My kids just got braces and I wanted to make sure they practiced good oral hygiene
customer_reviews.text: This is our first water flosser. My kids just got braces and I wanted to make sure they practiced good oral hygiene. I tried this water flosser out first before having them try it. In order to get great results you have to use the higher pressure settings. Otherwise it is just squirting water on your teeth. Middle to high pressure is good. After using it I felt as if I had just left the dentist office. You know that clean teeth feeling. We've only had it for a couple days and I'm satisfied with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre Durant

customer_reviews.title: great for permanent retainers
customer_reviews.text: love it! i have permanent retainers on it definently takes out all the left over food that i can't do with regular floss. there are different pressure levels soo i'd advise to not start at the strongest one soo you don't hurt your gums. tongue cleaner works too!
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Flores

customer_reviews.title: Small unit but does the job
customer_reviews.text: I found this model quite cute--small in size and would be easy to go with me when I travel. It does the job though. However, I've never had another unit, so I cannot adequately and fairly compare.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flossing device! Better than killing your gums
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty amazing item. My husband raved about it bought it and we all use it nightly. My 5 year old can operate it because it is so simple to use! She loves to floss her teeth now!! The seller is also very responsive and courteous and followed up to make sure we Loved The water flosser. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tara scheurn

customer_reviews.title: Good product and great service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this irrigator a few weeks ago because I got braces. It works very well and I save a lot of time. Everything is perfectly clean within a minute. In the meantime I have ordered 4 pieces for friends and everyone is happy with it. The power supply of one device was defective, I contacted the company by email and a replacement was immediately sent. To my surprise, a completely new device was sent straight away, completely unbureaucratic. Therefore, the seller deserves a 5-star rating, very good service!!! I can only recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: RIM

customer_reviews.title: This water flosser is amazing. My husband and I have been using it ...
customer_reviews.text: This water flosser is amazing. My husband and I have been using it for the past week after receiving it and already i can feel the difference with my gums. I love that there are 3 nozzles colored differently that way my husband and I can use the same machine with different nozzles, and the different levels of water pressure are great. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: The product design is excellent. Very convent to use, works well, and takes up a small footprint on the countertop. It is designed to pause briefly a 30 and 60 seconds to alert the user not to over-stress their gums. Some reviewers seem to have not understood this function. At half the price of Waterpik, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ryden

customer_reviews.title: Compact with power!
customer_reviews.text: Lower price but just as efficient as the big dog dental water flosser. The power button is on the unit but the sprayer on/off is conveniently on the spayer handle! It tends to stop occasionally before the water is gone and I have to power it off, then on again, but it's still brand new to me so it may be something I'm doing or not doing. Good product for the price though!
customer_reviews.author: Verena

customer_reviews.title: Broken After 1 Month
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great until this week when it broke. The motor runs but the water just spills out, no pressure at all. I bought it less than 2 months ago, Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay for a few months. Then it started intermittently failing. It would just suddenly pause in the middle of cleaning. I could sometimes get it to restart by shaking it or turning it on and off. Then a few weeks after that it just stopped working completely. I give it two stars because WHEN IT WORKS, it is actually cleans my teeth and gums pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Transaction and shipping were flawless - product is well designed and works perfectly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, use it several times a week
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, use it several times a week. It gets rid of all excess food that you can't reach with a toothbrush. Use lukewarm water not cold and be careful when you change the settings because the highest setting is quite fast.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great deep cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This appliance is cheaper than a Waterpik but works as well. This appliance flushes debris that flossing and brushing alone won't. It also has a long enough water line so that you're not forced to lean too close to the unit. I'm happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rainys A. Blekaitis

customer_reviews.title: Very well put together product!
customer_reviews.text: Only just put this device to work, but I’m confident this is one of those serendipitous purchases I’ll enjoy for a long time. Everything is perfect, wrapping, packaging, —everything! Easy instructions. Improved oral hygiene from the outset.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great, but be careful!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I turned it on, I squirted H20 all over, but its really good once you figure out how to use it. You should start with a low setting, and not squirt the ceiling like I did. I love how it has several parts you can use. Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: 🌙Katrina🌙

customer_reviews.title: Bad design and dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: After only a month of use just suddenly it lost jet pressure significantly enough that I decided to open it and see what was wrong with it , to my surprise the motor and electrical board where super wet and starting to bridge the small board electrical components, Im not an expert on electronics but this parts should have being isolated from any moisture never mind direct contact with water leaking directly into sensitive parts, that is no bueno.
customer_reviews.author: FILEMON VAZQUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product and service
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product and service. Suction cups on the bottom would be nice. It slides on counter when I switch it of and on, This sliding requires me to use two hands..one to hold machine the other to push the switch.....inconvenient!.
customer_reviews.author: code

customer_reviews.title: The magnetic handle does not stay attached to the unit.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job but the design needs work. The magnetic handle does not stay attached to the unit. If you move the unit ever so slightly, the hand piece falls off. Also, the lid for the water reservoir doesn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Kinda cheaply made, but better than flossing.
customer_reviews.text: While it works and does the job, the connection from pick to the hose is not super tight and leaks a bit. The button on the pick is flimsy and will often stall the machine if you accidently press it. As far a power, you can certainly crank it super high enough to cause pain. This is much better than using floss for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This machine  thoroughly cleans between your teeth & gum line
customer_reviews.text: I love this flosser. Even after flossing with the traditional string it’s amazing how many particles can still be in your teeth. The machine appears clean as opposed to other machines I read about after months of use. I would not travel with this machine because it’s just a little too big for a lite packer.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothea M.

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it does a great job and does exactly what we wanted it for
customer_reviews.text: We are really liking this product. The only thing I wish they would change is it's a natural reflex to want to pick it up the container that you put the water in once we are finished using this. You can't do that as the whole bowl pulls out. They need to add a handle or have some way of locking it to keep it from coming off when you go to pick up the unit itself. Other than that it does a great job and does exactly what we wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I received the product and it had a small defect. I was a little bummed out but I reached out to the company and Grace.L was terrific I showed her the issue and she had a new one on the way. Most of these products will provide the same functionality but outstanding customer service is rare. I would recommend this product to my friends and family. Good customer service should be recognized and rewarded! Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Great, but where are the other attachments sold online?
customer_reviews.text: Just started using it and it works quite well. It's a bit on the loud side, but it doesn't bother me. Only issue I have is that it says in the user manual that the peridontal pick is sold separately, but I cannot find it on the main website at all, just the Water Flosser. I really was hoping to get the attachment to help with my gingivitis, so I'm getting a waterpik one and pray it works with this water flow.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately 2 units didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this dental irrigator because it was one of the few on the market that had nozzles for more than one user. The first one that came didn't send the water through the tube to the flosser so I returned it and ordered a replacement. When the replacement unit arrived it had the same problem. That one was also returned. I'm disappointed and will continue searching for a unit that works.
customer_reviews.author: Esteem Lady

customer_reviews.title: Attachments get loose quickly
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well. I like that it has different attachments and they are easily stored in the lid. They are already getting loose though and sometimes water goes everywhere out of the side of the wand.
customer_reviews.author: TJean

customer_reviews.title: I like the Belmint
customer_reviews.text: I gave up on WaterPik after my third unit in the last year began having problems. I like the Belmint, it requires a little more attention to loading and cleaning, but the performance has been great. The only deficiency I noted, is the handle could be easier to store. You have to position the handle perfectly against the base, it takes some time to position it properly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Robert Neely

customer_reviews.title: WEIRD SOUND
customer_reviews.text: Greetings! What is wrong with this item. Not sure if what I received is defective or normal. It produces a sound like a tsu tsu train preparing to take of and sometimes shut off by itself while in use. Can you advice please. I can upload a video to show you what I mean. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: LitoR

customer_reviews.title: Two complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Two complaints - I cannot 'hang up' the flosser as shown in the picture (maybe after 5 or 6 tries) and the nozzle comes out REAL EASY when you are using it. Yep - water every where! I am sure that over a period of time I will be able to figure the winning technic of using your flosser. It gives me something new to work on in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Owen J. Mahon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so thrilled to be using this water flosser! It's such a great product and the company is so lovely and helpful! My water flosser didn't work when I received it, so I got in contact with Tom (head of Belmint's Customer Service) and he ended up being super kind and sent me a replacement. I was so thrilled that he got back to me so quickly. My replacement also arrived within 2 days. Will definitely purchase again if I need to. They were so helpful and such a lovely company.
customer_reviews.author: Tinsy

customer_reviews.title: it seems to have good power, it is easy to use (once i ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first water pik I have used so i don't have anything to compare it to. However, it seems to have good power, it is easy to use (once i figured it out). I am now exploring use with the attachments and the different settings. The company was super prompt in getting it out... arrived in 2 days. I don like that the lid has a compartment on top to store the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: patricia moore

customer_reviews.title: Effective and unintrusive
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Holds more than adequate amount of water and has great jet stream. Love the top storage for other users...and LOVE retractable cord. I'm a countertop minimalist but this does not disturb my sense of order.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: The product is Great and the support is even better
customer_reviews.text: I used the flosser for over a year and was very pleased . After a year the pressure dropped so I contacted "Home Sleek Home" and they immediately responded and are sending a new product for free. As an electrical engineer , I know it is not easy to design a flawless product and this is why I was so impressed with the way they took care of my request . 4 star product / 5 stars customer care .
customer_reviews.author: Efrat R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Great pressure regulation, does the job and a must have for dental bridge wearers. If you never used one of these before, flossing will never be the same, gets in all the nooks and cranies. The nature of this product makes it messy, your shooting water in your mouth, the natural reflex is to leave your mouth open, causing water to run down your hand and arm to floor, don't use the product in a suit and tie!
customer_reviews.author: Steven K. Callaway

customer_reviews.title: Works great now
customer_reviews.text: Works great! When first unpacked, the water tank gasket was upside down and it wasn’t getting any water. Check that if you have any problems; it’s easy to turn over.
customer_reviews.author: Hotside

customer_reviews.title: Happy teeth and gums!
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe how fast it shipped! I got it in one day, It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Dentist recommended for a healthy mouth.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It's a little loud though. If you put a little antibacterial mouthwash in the basen, it helps keep the machine clean and give the user a better clean (at least that was what the dentist told me it does.)
customer_reviews.author: Power Shopper

customer_reviews.title: 2 month lifetime
customer_reviews.text: Was good and then after 2 months stopped working. Is loud, bulky was i didn’t care cause it was doing it’s job... but 2 months of life? That’s ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas jequier

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Quet , pretty compact and takes less counter top space . The only negative I have to say it shuts down by itself and I have to restart it . Don't know if it's just me using it for too long . Otherwise no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana

customer_reviews.title: Good variety of water pressure choices
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this water pick for a few days now and I'm happy with it. The range of water pressure choices is wonderful: sometimes I have peridontal gum flare-ups that make water-flossing painful so it's great to be able to change to a lower water pressure when cleaning these areas. I'm very happy with this cleaning machine.
customer_reviews.author: Martina Lively

customer_reviews.title: Check your shipment right away
customer_reviews.text: Giving this four stars because the first one broke and the second one had a hole in the tank. But long story short I just put the old tank on the new one and now I have one that works perfectly fine. It works great other than the issues I’ve had.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: It is a great device. It "water flosses" you teeth very well ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product back around Christmas and have been using it ever since I received it. It is a great device. It "water flosses" you teeth very well and I love the fact that it has a dial on it that you can set to monitor and control the force of the water you are using while "water flossing". The only downfall that this device has is it to too tall to fit completely under my faucet in my bathroom sink, but that's a minor detail in comparison to the good this machine does. My grandson loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Pam S.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed. The first one the water pressure wouldn’t stop ...
customer_reviews.text: The second oral irrigator that didn’t work. Extremely disappointed. The first one the water pressure wouldn’t stop randomly pulsing and sounded as if it was over working to get water through (with a full tank).This one didn’t even turn on after assembled. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job. I HAVE AN ODD ALLERGY. ALLERGIC TO COLORED PLASTIC. IT HAS CLEAR TIPS. THOSE ARE HARD TO FIND.
customer_reviews.author: Betty ervin

customer_reviews.title: Product no longer working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item and it was received 7-29-18. However, the product has stopped working. What is the warranty for this product? Thank you. Delivered Jul 29, 2018 Your package was left near the front door or porch. Dental Water Flosser with 3 Interchangeable Nozzles for Deep Cleaning Between Teeth, Gumline, Braces and Bridges, Includes BONUS Tongue Scraper, 600ml Capacity Sold by: Home Sleek Home Return window closed on Aug 28, 2018
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Peach

customer_reviews.title: Belmint Review
customer_reviews.text: The Belmint I ordered lasted one year and has stopped working. This devise started to leak water. I like this product when it worked, but I was hoping for longer use.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Redmann

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: After brushing my teeth it’s amazing how much is still hidden in your gum lines Using this water dental floss knocks everything out. Best WaterPik I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.author: Denise Averis

customer_reviews.title: Quit working
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this unit At the end of May. Having water pressure issues. Unable to adjust water pressure. Re-read my instruction manual to no avail. No email address available in instruction booklet to contact the manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: David griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this for travel. There are a decent amount of parts and it's a plastic design. I could easily see this getting broken. Beyond that, it's a fantastic product that works well for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Works great, good price and good followup
customer_reviews.text: Works great, good price and good followup. Now if my hygienist is just as excited we have ourselves a winner. Actually, we have a winner now. I love the way my mouth feels so clean after I use it.
customer_reviews.author: DCobb

customer_reviews.title: Ok product !
customer_reviews.text: Great until it finally broke last week -water started leaking out from the handle you hold with -At least this product worked well for a little less than two years. Though it’s loud, enjoyed the many different settings from 0-10 .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks to be  Decent Product
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my 19 year old Grandson and he said he liked it as it has helped sort out a problem gum area he had....tha tis the reaon for the 4 stars, certainly looks to be a decent product!
customer_reviews.author: RayN

customer_reviews.title: Great for healthy gums and after eating a peanut butter ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these types of machines for decades. Because of the limited water volume, I adjusted it so both departs flow simultaneously. I’d prefer a single large tank. Great for healthy gums and after eating a peanut butter sandwich 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Gordon A.

customer_reviews.title: a pretty good flosser
customer_reviews.text: For the price, a pretty good flosser. It's not the cadillac of flossers but it does the job. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: nancyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Thinking about getting all our adult children one!  We love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, no need to spend a ton of $$ for the fancy brand name works great and I love that it has a storage place for the various pics it comes with. We actually bought a second one for your downstairs bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kelleigh K Chittenden

customer_reviews.title: Only changes pulse speed.
customer_reviews.text: Works quite well, though the machine doesn't actually change the pressure of the water when you adjust the knob; it only changes the interval at which the water comes out in pulses. Attractive, though. If it did change the pressure, I would use it to clean my ears, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fish

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome buy especially if you wear braces. This machine is easy to use with self explanatory directions. What I like best is that when in use, (depending on the level that you set) the pressure from the water massages your gums that feels really good. In addition, it superseded my expectations of removing the access food out of your braces and brackets that couldn't get caught just by regular brushing. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This a wonderful product. My daughter has braces and an expander ...
customer_reviews.text: This a wonderful product. My daughter has braces and an expander and this comes in handy not only to keep her teeth clean while she has the braces but to catch the stuck food pieces and help her not have to stick scrapers in her mouth. The different adjustable pieces that it comes with help too. From the tongue scraper to the different size tubes to help get at the gums and in between teeth. It does squirt water all over the place but so does the dentist or hygienist when they clean your teeth. It is easy to use and easy to clean up. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Dalila Sebring

customer_reviews.title: Sadly I had to return it 😢
customer_reviews.text: Man I Really Wanted to like this Water Flosser but Sadly I had to send it back it worked Once and it made me so upset 😭 When this product doesn’t work I don’t Trust it and so I sent it back. 😐
customer_reviews.author: Becky d Hobson

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work. i bought it for my granddaughter ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work. i bought it for my granddaughter who has braces and was going to give it to her but her mom git one for her instead. i decided to keep it for myself but when i hooked it up it doesn't work. i'm not sure how to exchange it since its been a couple of weeks since i got it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Nice and for the money awesome
customer_reviews.text: Nice and for the money awesome. I have been using a water flosser for a long time and this is by far the best one yet. It has quite a range of pressure so practice before using
customer_reviews.author: Indy

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: It is ok but not what you think it is
customer_reviews.author: Sercan Sedef Tonbul

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: stopped working after a month of normal use but while it was working it was a great product. Gave it a one star for travel use because it wasn't really designed for travel use.
customer_reviews.author: gasrock

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mom and it arrived broken. She let it sit for 3 months and now I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: The water flossed is easy to use and quickly dislodges food particles The only ...
customer_reviews.text: The water flossed is easy to use and quickly dislodges food particles The only thing I don't like is the tendency for the lids to parts to separate. This is where the extra nozzles are stored.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Waller

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice compact product
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice compact product, seems well designed, looks nice too. Nice price. I struggle just a tiny bit with the on off but other than that no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: It was not a fine stream as much as shooting water that was only ...
customer_reviews.text: Item was functional, but was not the quality I had expected. It was light weight plastic with a few plastic attachments. It was not a fine stream as much as shooting water that was only effective on the highest pressure setting. Overall, it's not horrible. You will feel cleaner after using it, but it wasn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cordie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t turn on
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, hooked it up and it doesn’t even turn on. I was so excited about this product and I am extremely bummed that it doesn’t work! Now I will have to go through the trouble of returning it and I do not even think I want a new one of this brand. So disappointed. Then I read several reviews of others having the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: The unit is well designed, easy to operate, attractive and effective. The variable power can be adjusted to your liking, with plenty of power if you desire a stronger stream. The handle switch enables one to start/stop the stream. This is handy since you can fill the tank with warm liquid, then run it for a couple of seconds directing the stream into the sink, then stop the stream with the handle switch and place it in your mouth before turning it back on. In this manner, you ensure water flossing with warm liquid. The lid doubles as a storage tray for the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Sorrentino

customer_reviews.title: very effective  flosser
customer_reviews.text: Nice flosser, does not take up a lot of room on counter. lives up to its advertisement and is powerful enough to assure proper cleaning .I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: stephano

customer_reviews.title: I give this a five star
customer_reviews.text: I love to use this product my mouth feels so fresh and clean right after I floss with this 100%
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

product_meta.title: Belmint Water Flosser Dental Oral Irrigator for Teeth Braces - Deep Cleaning Between Teeth, Gum Flosser for Teeth, Braces, and Bridges, 3 Water Jet Tips Includes Tongue Scraper, 600ml Water Tank
feature_bullets: The Belmint electric flosser features 10 pressure settings, range of 0 to 90 PSI w/1400 pulses per minute. Pressure and pulsations cleans deep between teeth and gum line, removing harmful bacteria and debris that traditional brushing and string flossing can’t reach

Water flossers for teeth come with 3 BPA-free interchangeable nozzles that rotate 360 degrees to reach all sides of your mouth, removing plaque around braces, implants, bridges, and crown - It comes with a tongue scraper to prevent bad breath.
Counter-top water flosser is designed with a 20.28oz reservoir that provides 180 seconds of water during use, you don't need to add water while flossing. The cover keeps water reservoir dust-proof

Dental water flosser features a 2-minute timer and 30-second pacer that takes the guesswork out of water flossing so that you know when to move to a different mouth quadrant. Includes water On/Off switch on the handle for easy use
Electric oral irrigator for teeth is anti-leakages. The design prevents water from leaking all over the bathroom. If you have any problems with the water flosser teeth cleaner, please contact us
